name: U.F.O Unforseen First Odyssey
description:
Team Bouken Games  presents:  Unforeseen First Odyssey (UFO)

Follow Juno as he goes from the Odyssey Station, to space, to an unknown   planet where he must find pieces of his space ship to put it back   together and get back to space.

Feedback Form:   https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=VXKFnlffR0ygwAVGRgOAy7DsB8ulGFZNqzcg9oV5vuZURUNHRDZDQUwwMUFPQlA5Q04zWVA5WjRBNi4u

  • Shannon   Lewandowski   -   Voice Acting

Controls

  • E- Interact
  •  Shift - Reset Camera
  •  WASD - Move
  •  Space - Jump//Dialogue Progression
  • RMB (Right Mouse Button) - Move Camera
  • P - Pause

Full   release on  5/5/22.

More updates coming soon, stay tuned!
